metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12983 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer over-read in the PdfEncryptMD5Base::ComputeEncryptionKey() function in PdfEncrypt.cpp in PoDoFo 0.9.6-rc1 could be leveraged by remote attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
